What Are Some Ways In Which You Can Maximise Your Learning Capabilities?如何最大化发挥你的学习能力？

获得110好评的回答@Sanjay Abraham

Remember to study for knowledge and not study for getting good grades! This helped me a lot, and so might help you too…千万记住学习的目的是知识不是成绩。这一点对我帮助很大，可能对你也用。

1) Keep your study area organized and comfortable:使你的学习地方有序舒适。

This helps you to concentrate better while studying by reducing unwanted distractions. Keeping all the required books, pens, and other instruments within reach help you to stay focused on studying. You don’t have to look around for any book you need.这有利于你集中注意力，减少不必要的注意力分散。将必要的书本、笔、以及其他工具放在可及的地方有利于集中学习。你不需要四处找你的书。

2) Discover ways to enhance your concentration:寻找可以提高注意力的方法。

Concentration is unquestionably the most important attribute necessary to enjoy studying. Staying focused on what you are reading helps you to understand and absorb it. Therefore, it is absolutely essential for you to ascertain all the essentials that enhance your concentration. 专心对于享受学习来说是必要的态度，集中注意力阅读有利于你理解和吸收，因此，将所有必需品归置好对于提高注意力很很有利。

3) To enjoy studying, prepare in advance for tests:提前准备好考试也是为了更好地享受学习。

If you intend to truly enjoy studying, you must make it a habit to prepare well in advance for all your tests. You cannot enjoy studying when you are preparing on the last day prior to your test. This will make studying a painful experience for you.如果你想要真正地享受学习，你必须养成良好习惯提前备战所有考试。当你在临考试前一天临时抱佛脚你根本不可能会享受学习，只会觉得学习是痛苦的。

4) Ensure that your study area is free from disturbances:确保学习的地方可以避免干扰。

Ensure that outside noise and disturbances do not affect your studies. Your study table must be located in a silent area free from all external disturbances.确保外界的噪音和干扰不会影响你的学习，你应该在一个安静不会被打扰的地方学习。

5) Mark all important dates on a wall calendar:在日历上标记所有重要的日子。

6) Remember to take short breaks:记得让自己喘息一会。

Taking short breaks during studying helps you in retaining more of what you have studied. Hence, short breaks are helpful during a long study session.歇一会可以让你记住前面所学的知识。因此，休息片刻对于长时间学习非常有帮助。

7) Manage your time optimally:有效安排时间。

8) Stay positive :保持积极的态度。

Staying positive is necessary to enjoy studying. Think of all the benefits you can derive from scoring high grades. This will motivate you to strive harder in your studies.保持积极对于享受学习来说很有必要。想像一下得高分后的好处，这将激励更加刻苦学习。

9) Be prepared; banish fear of exams:做好准备，消除对考试的恐惧。
